location: Wolong Street, Da'an District, ~205m from Linguang MRT Station
notes: Spacious 2BR/2BA whole-floor unit (25 ping) in a 13-story building with elevator. Move-in ready with full furnishings, appliances, and 3 balconies. Being on 2F with multiple balconies warrants checking railing safety for baby; cooking allowed with natural gas and pets permitted. Agent specializes in expat rentals which may ease communication. Cannot confirm modern condition without seeing actual interior photos.
